name: MAN_OS
description:
Take control of 2 hands joined together by a chain and get to the end of each experiment.
Can be played as a 2 player co-op game, or take your chances and play as both hands yourself.

Controls:

Move Blue Hand: W,A,S,D

Blue Hand Action: Space / Left Control

Move Orange Hand: Arrow Keys

Orange Hand Action: Right shift/Right Control
Restart: R

Credits:

ART: Nictobrio

https://instagram.com/nictobrio_3d?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

Code, Music: me
